ygData.subject: RE: Dissapointments with everquest.
ygData.msgSnippet: First, when did I say the original post was bad? Second, it was mean as a statement to calm down, not a joke but why does a sentence suggesting smoking weed
ygData.messageBody:
First, when did I say the original post was bad? Second, it was mean as a
statement to calm down, not a joke but why does a sentence suggesting
smoking weed come out so bad? Third and most important, try something new
sometime in your life... maybe any drug would do you some good.

-----Original Message-----
From: errors-159870-3024-opium=punkass.com@onelist.com
[mailto:errors-159870-3024-opium=punkass.com@onelist.com]On Behalf Of
Sergey Bukhman
Sent: Sunday, September 12, 1999 4:10 AM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Dissapointments with everquest.


From: Sergey Bukhman <sergeyb@...>



Richard Slater wrote:
>
> From: "Richard Slater" <opium@...>
>
> Well, what was the purpose of replying to my message with a response like
> that?
> Take some time off EQ and smoke weed, quit acting like your having a gun
put
> to the back of your head.
>

Jesus, you think the original post is bad, and then this one suggests to
go smoke weed...

--
Sergey
